job.title: Software Sr Engineer - BI Developer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThis position plays a critical role in driving business transformation through technical innovation and will support business intelligence work within Wells Fargos Wells Fargo CRM Customer Relationship Management system We are seeking a Software Sr Engineer that has extensive experience in Power BI along with experience in moving from OnPremise to Cloud and setting up net new Projects in the Cloud Position will also have a strong Agile background to align with that Go Forward model The key skills are specific to the Power BI and Power Platform Go Forward ModelbrbrThe individual will work closely with product owners technical teams architects and senior managers to ensure timely delivery of critical projects As a senior resource this individual will also provide guidance and leadership to more junior developers and staff and is expected to be a leader within the agile delivery teams they are aligned tobrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli7 years of software engineering experiencelili5 years of Agile experiencelili3 years of technical engagement experience with multiple stakeholderslili5 years of business intelligence experiencelili5 years of data analysis experiencebrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliliExposure to experiencelili5 years of net experiencelili5 years of MS SQL server experienceliliKnowledge and understanding of relational database concepts querying data warehousing ETL process requirements
